programme.title: Your Saturday In The Mix
programme.desc: Elevate your Saturday vibes with a mix of the best beats and tunes. Tune in and let One World Radio soundtrack your weekend adventures.

programme.title: Sound Of Sunrise
programme.desc: Good morning! Wake up to the finest tunes dance music has to offer. Tune in to Sound Of Sunrise on One World Radio.

programme.title: Daybreak Sessions with Justin
programme.desc: Join Justin every weekday morning for "Daybreak Sessions," where he sets the perfect easy dance music vibe to kickstart your day. Tune in to One World Radio and let Justin accompany you through your morning routine with smooth tunes and positive vibes.

programme.title: Your Weekend with Ben Malone
programme.desc: Join the radio airwaves with Ben Malone. Tune in and let Ben Malone guide you through the perfect weekend playlist.

programme.title: Tomorrowland Top 30 with NERVO
programme.desc: Every week, Australian duo and twin sisters NERVO serve you the hottest 30 records of the moment. You, the People of Tomorrow, have put together the list by voting for your 3 favourite hits of the moment.

programme.title: Best of One World Radio with AdamK
programme.desc: So many things happen on One World Radio in just one week! That's why every Friday, One World Radio's AdamK serves you a one-hour show with the ultimate highlights of the week.

programme.title: Sunday Recharge
programme.desc: It's Sunday, the final day of the week! Take this opportunity to recharge your batteries and get ready for the week ahead with One World Radio.

programme.title: Daybreak Sessions with Justin
programme.desc: Join Justin every weekday morning for "Daybreak Sessions," where he sets the perfect easy dance music vibe to kickstart your day. Tune in to One World Radio and let Justin accompany you through your morning routine with smooth tunes and positive vibes.

programme.title: Meet The World with Camille
programme.desc: Tune in to "Meet The World with Camille" every weekday from noon to 13:00 CET. Camille plays the best lunch tunes and takes requests from you, the People of Tomorrow.

programme.title: United Through Music with AdamK
programme.desc: People of Tomorrow! Unite through the power of music, wherever you are around the world. Tune in to United Through Music with AdamK, exclusively here on One World Radio.

programme.title: Celebrate The Magic with Greg Jake
programme.desc: Join the People of Tomorrow celebrating the magic with Greg Jake, straight from Texas, USA, as he hosts One World Radio every Monday through Thursday, from 19:00 to 21:00 CET.

programme.title: In The Mix
programme.desc: Tune in to "In the Mix" for a blend of the latest chart-toppers and timeless classics. One World Radio curates the perfect playlist to keep you grooving.
